exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "(fix MapGet (m : Map state) : ad -> option state := match m with | @M0 _ => fun _ : ad => None | @M1 _ x y => fun a : ad => if (x =? a)%N then Some y else None | @M2 _ m1 m2 => fun a : ad => match a with | 0%N => MapGet m1 0%N | N.pos (p~1)%positive => MapGet m2 (N.pos p) | N.pos (p~0)%positive => MapGet m1 (N.pos p) | 1%N => MapGet m2 0%N end end) d a" in the current goal.

ctx: intros d a s a0 t Hrec Hnone.
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA a : ad s : state a0 : ad t : term Hrec : reconnaissance d a0 t Hnone : (fix MapGet (m : Map state) : ad -> option state := match m with | @M0 _ => fun _ : ad => None | @M1 _ x y => fun a : ad => if (x =? a)%N then Some y else None | @M2 _ m1 m2 => fun a : ad => match a with | 0%N => MapGet m1 0%N | N.pos (p~1)%positive => MapGet m2 (N.pos p) | N.pos (p~0)%positive => MapGet m1 (N.pos p) | 1%N => MapGet m2 0%N end end) d a = None Unable to unify "reconnaissance d a0 t" with "reconnaissance ((fix MapPut (m : Map state) : ad -> state -> Map state := match m with | @M0 _ => M1 state | @M1 _ a y => fun (a' : ad) (y' : state) => match N.lxor a a' with | 0%N => M1 state a' y' | N.pos p => MapPut1 state a y a' y' p end | @M2 _ m1 m2 => fun (a : ad) (y : state) => match a with | 0%N => M2 state (MapPut m1 0%N y) m2 | N.pos (p~1)%positive => M2 state m1 (MapPut m2 (N.pos p) y) | N.pos (p~0)%positive => M2 state (MapPut m1 (N.pos p) y) m2 | 1%N => M2 state m1 (MapPut m2 0%N y) end end) d a s) a0 t".

original: intros d a s a0 t Hrec Hnone. unfold reconnaissance. unfold reconnaissance in Hrec. unfold MapPut. unfold MapGet in Hnone. rewrite Hnone. apply Hrec.
